thought: To craft purpur_slab, I need to craft 4 purpur_block. To craft purpur_block, I need to place 4 popped_chorus_fruit on the crafting table. To craft popped_chorus_fruit, I need to smelt chorus_fruit. I have 4 chorus_fruits in slot 12, so I will start by smelting one into an empty slot (eg., 15).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 12 to slot 15 with quantity 1
